title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: When performing a search for references to a field in the external jar (Build 200201151), the first match is not selected. To reproduce this issue, follow the steps below.
OB: Double-click on the search result. Observe that the first match is not selected.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, ensure that JDK1.3.1 is set as the default JRE (and that you have the source for rt.jar). Then, follow these steps:
1. Open java.io.File
2. Select the field 'tmpFir'
